ModMetaData.name: NO Vanilla Music
ModMetaData.author: RedstoneRevolution
ModMetaData.description:
A revival of Saltgin's "Disable Vanilla Music". Saltgin's: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1582710278
This mod removes VANILLA MUSIC from the game.
This mod is save-compatible and can be placed any where in the loadorder.
